title: Loan
description: Links the item with the patron and applies certain conditions based on policies

id.description: Unique ID (generated UUID) of the loan

userId.description: ID of the patron the item was lent to. Required for open loans, not required for closed loans (for anonymization).

proxyUserId.description: ID of the user representing a proxy for the patron

itemId.description: ID of the item lent to the patron

name.description: Name of the status (currently can be any value, values commonly used are Open and Closed)

loanDate.description: Date time when the loan began (typically represented according to rfc3339 section-5.6. Has not had the date-time format validation applied as was not supported at point of introduction and would now be a breaking change)

dueDate.description: Date time when the item is due to be returned

returnDate.description: Date time when the item is returned and the loan ends (typically represented according to rfc3339 section-5.6. Has not had the date-time format validation applied as was not supported at point of introduction and would now be a breaking change)

systemReturnDate.description: Date time when the returned item is actually processed

action.description: Last action performed on a loan (currently can be any value, values commonly used are checkedout and checkedin)

actionComment.description: Comment to last action performed on a loan

itemStatus.description: Last item status used in relation to this loan (currently can be any value, values commonly used are Checked out and Available)

renewalCount.description: Count of how many times a loan has been renewed (incremented by the client)

loanPolicyId.description: ID of last policy used in relation to this loan

checkoutServicePointId.description: ID of the Service Point where the last checkout occured

checkinServicePointId.description: ID of the Service Point where the last checkin occured

dueDateChangedByRecall.description: Indicates whether or not this loan had its due date modified by a recall on the loaned item

metadata.title: Metadata Schema
metadata.description: Metadata about creation and changes to records, provided by the server (client should not provide)

createdDate.description: Date and time when the record was created

createdByUserId.description: ID of the user who created the record (when available)

createdByUsername.description: Username of the user who created the record (when available)

updatedDate.description: Date and time when the record was last updated

updatedByUserId.description: ID of the user who last updated the record (when available)

updatedByUsername.description: Username of the user who last updated the record (when available)
